Title bar background color.description: We recommend a dark contrasting color.

Button background color.description: It should be lighter than the default background color.

ux-button-padding-v.title: Button vertical padding
ux-button-padding-v.description: Sets the vertical space between a button's contents and its borders.

ux-button-padding-h.title: Button horizontal padding
ux-button-padding-h.description: Sets the horizontal space between a button's contents and its borders.

ux-button-radius.title: Button border radius
ux-button-radius.description: Adjusts the button roundness. Set to 0 for square buttons!
